select a.id, a.property_key, a.category_level, a.category_id, b.property_key_id, b.id property_value_id, b.property_value from platform_property_key a inner join platform_property_value b on a.id=b.property_key_id
or (a.category_id=#{category1Id} and a.category_level=1)
or (a.category_id=#{category2Id} and a.category_level=2)
or (a.category_id=#{category3Id} and a.category_level=3)

SELECT a.id, a.property_key, a.category_id, a.category_level, b.id property_value_id, b.property_value, b.property_key_id FROM platform_property_key a INNER JOIN platform_property_value b ON a.id = b.property_key_id INNER JOIN sku_platform_property_value c ON c.property_value_id = b.id WHERE c.sku_id = #{skuId}
